first_translate: is this okay?
doesn’t it feel awkward?
not at all.
good!
make sure your face stays hidden like that...

hangle: 내 머리색 보다 네 외모가 더 눈에 띌 테니까.
first_translate: ...because people will notice how pretty you are more than my hair color.

hangle: …너 정말 분위기 깨는 데 뭐 있다…
first_translate: you really know how to ruin the moment...
hmm...
the manor looks better maintained than I expected.
I wonder what kind of monsters they keep here.
no idea.
get up!
come on, hit him harder!
move,
march!
this doesn’t look good.
it’s not safe.
y-you idiot!!!
I-I’m your trainer!!!

hangle: 관리가 안 되는걸 보아하니 조만간 큰 사고가 터지겠는데.
first_translate: judging by their lack of control over these beasts, something terrible could soon occur.
fiona.
their operation seems bigger than we thought.

hangle: 그리고 정체가 짐작 가는 귀족이 몇 명 보여.
first_translate: and there seem to be several nobles whose identities can easily be guessed from afar.

hangle: 헤일론과 네 휘하의 기사단만으로 뒤집기는 힘들까?
first_translate: would it be hard to take them down using only house haylon and our guardsmen?
if we’re lucky enough to capture everyone alive,

hangle: 혼란 속에서 운 나쁘게 마물이 풀린다면 위험하겠지.
first_translate: then yes. but if any of those monsters get loose during the chaos, things might become dangerous.
that makes sense...

hangle: 게다가 시그렌과 헤일론 가문, 둘이서만 협조했다가는 꼭 뒷말이 나오겠지.
first_translate: besides, if houses haylon and sigren work together alone, rumors may spread about us afterward.

hangle: 깔끔하게 처리하려면 중립 귀족을 끌어들이는게 좋을까?
first_translate: do you think it’d be best to involve some neutral noble families so as to avoid such complications?
fiona, wait.
the crown prince is here too.
what?! where?!
I don’t see him anywhere.
he’s farther below.
oh, he’s going inside somewhere...
ah! there he is.
I wonder why he went inside.
no clue...
I doubt his reason was anything wholesome.
hm...
are these the only ones available?
where are the higher-level demons you mentioned last time?
my apologies, but--
slowpokes.

hangle: 멍청한 녀석, 그걸 준비하는게 쉬운 줄 알아?
first_translate: stupid fool. do you think preparing those would be easy?

hangle: 하지만 황태자가 내 투기장을 마음에 들어 하는 건 정말 천운이지.
first_translate: but it's truly fortunate that the crown prince likes coming to my arena.

hangle: 돈만 좀 주면 투기장이 불법이라는 것도 눈 감아 주니까.
first_translate: as long as I give him money, he turns a blind eye to its illegality.

hangle: 비위 맞추는 것 정도는 해줄 수 있지!
first_translate: of course, I’ll make sure to keep him happy!

hangle: 한시라도 빨리 더 재밌는 걸 준비하겠습니다.
first_translate: I'll prepare something even more entertaining right away.

hangle: 생각보다 사업의 규모가 너무 큰 것 같아.
first_translate: the scale of their business appears much larger than I anticipated.
I agree.

hangle: 황태자를 끌어들이면서 사업의 규모가 원작보다 더 커져 버렸어.
first_translate: now that the crown prince has gotten involved, everything has grown far beyond what happened in the novel.
I didn’t expect things to go this far. I made a mistake.

hangle: 이쯤 되면 정말로 다른 귀족가의 힘을 빌려야겠는데.
first_translate: at this point, I believe we need help from other noble families.
but we can’t ask livia for her assistance.
in that case...
is he the only one left?
oh dear.

hangle: 피오나 영애가 절 부른 건 실로 의외군요.
first_translate: lady fiona calling me herself came as quite a surprise.
yes...

hangle: 진짜로 도움이 될 수 있는게 이놈 뿐이라니…
first_translate: to think that this guy is the only one who can actually help us...

hangle: 후작님이 흥미를 가질 만한 사안이 있어서요.
first_translate: I called because I had a matter which I believed would interest you, lord pearl.

hangle: 전 딱히 황자 전하의 편을 들 생각은 없습니다.
first_translate: I am not planning to side with the crown prince.

hangle: 저도 그런 부탁을 할 생각으로 온 건 아닙니다.
first_translate: nor did I come here today expecting you to do so either.
then tell me, lady fiona... why exactly did you call upon me?
I hope this meeting proves interesting then.

hangle: 그냥 시간 낭비하기 싫다고 말 하지 그러니.
first_translate: can’t you just admit that you hate wasting time?

hangle: 후작님, 요즘 재무부를 운영하시는 게 힘들지 않으신가요?
first_translate: has managing the ministry of finance been difficult lately, lord pearl?

hangle: 황제나 황후가 사치가 꽤 심한 편이지.
first_translate: the emperor and empress tend to spend lavishly.
everything in life comes with difficulties.
a wise saying indeed.

hangle: 하지만 요즘 후작님을 더 피곤하게 하는 자들이 있는 모양이더군요.
first_translate: but recently, I heard that certain individuals were making matters worse for you.
lady fiona...

hangle: 피오나 영애만큼 사교계 화법이 안 어울리는 영애는 처음 봅니다.
first_translate: never before have I seen a young woman less suited to social etiquette than yourself.

hangle: 어색하니 그냥 본론을 말씀하시는 걸 추천합니다.
first_translate: since you find it uncomfortable, allow me to suggest getting straight to the point.

hangle: 어차피 빙빙 돌려 말하는 건 저도 시간 낭비라는 생각이 들고.
first_translate: beating around the bush feels like a waste of time anyway.
don’t regret this later.
go ahead.
pardon?
so...

hangle: 같이 세금 안 내는 놈들 잡으러 갈래요?
first_translate: want to join forces and catch tax evaders together?

hangle: 전 귀족 영애들에게 정말로 많은 제안을 받았습니다.
first_translate: I’ve received many offers from various ladies thus far.
they invited me to watch plays or drink tea with them.
or asked me to accompany them while drinking tea.
but...

hangle: 지금까지 받았던 제안 중에 제일 마음에 드는 건 이거군요.
first_translate: out of every offer I've ever received, yours is definitely my favorite.
